comment: Definition of projection operator in [Hughes] p. 47, except that we do not need linearity to be explicit by virtue of ~ hmoplin . (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
